insert into AbnormalGestation( basic_id, early_num, rengong_num, gongwaiyuan_num, zhongqi_num, yingchang_num, taieryichang, wanqiliuchang_num, fengmian, elsething
) values( #{basic_id}, #{early_num}, #{rengong_num}, #{gongwaiyuan_num}, #{zhongqi_num}, #{yingchang_num}, #{taieryichang}, #{wanqiliuchang_num}, #{fengmian}, #{elsething} )
